data: {"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "concept_name": "Being an Emotional Writer", "set": "Emotional Craft", "type": "element", "definition": "Building and regulating the emotional engine so the work carries lived feeling without burning you down.", "axes": "engine_type|ignition_source|vulnerability_mode|regulation|boundary|audience_distance|exposure_scope|embodiment_channel|heat_level|polish_pass", "axis_values": "grief|rage|tenderness|joy|shame|longing|awe|bewilderment | memory_snap|bodily_tell|overheard_line|image_seed|object_handle|place_pressure|question_hook|dialogue_start | confession|implication|witness_bearing|humor_glide|ritual_distance | unshaped_pour|paced_sets|container_then_release | names_changed|no_names|delay_release|topic_blacklist|no_boundary_flag | write_for_self|write_for_one|write_for_many | private|trusted_reader|wide_release | body|image|scene_action|object_symbol|syntax_rhythm | low|medium|high | unshaped|shaped|cut_to_bone", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "misconception_id": "over_polish", "description": "Sanding the feeling until only style remains.", "tells": "", "likely_causes": "", "corrective_feedback": "", "micro_drill": "", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "misconception_id": "no_boundaries_burnout", "description": "Writing without boundary choices until exhaustion.", "tells": "", "likely_causes": "", "corrective_feedback": "", "micro_drill": "", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "misconception_id": "ambiguity_smear", "description": "Hiding the feeling so much the page reads blank.", "tells": "", "likely_causes": "", "corrective_feedback": "", "micro_drill": "", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "misconception_id": "one_note_heat", "description": "Staying at one intensity with no modulation.", "tells": "", "likely_causes": "", "corrective_feedback": "", "micro_drill": "", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_engine_map", "concept_id": "emotional_engine", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label engine_type, ignition_source, and vulnerability_mode for a passage; cite one cue for each.", "expected_features": "Correct, text-cited calls; shows how emotion hits the page.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Specific, embodied, and defensible", "Meets": "Mostly correct/specific", "Developing": "Vague, performative, or off-target"}, "variation_axes": "engine_type|ignition_source|vulnerability_mode|regulation|boundary|audience_distance|exposure_scope|embodiment_channel|heat_level|polish_pass", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_container_build", "concept_id": "emotional_engine", "cognitive_goal": "design", "task_type": "compose", "prompt_template": "Define a writing container using only time, place, and boundary rules; write for 12 minutes inside it.", "expected_features": "Container described; draft shows risk with safety.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Specific, embodied, and defensible", "Meets": "Mostly correct/specific", "Developing": "Vague, performative, or off-target"}, "variation_axes": "engine_type|ignition_source|vulnerability_mode|regulation|boundary|audience_distance|exposure_scope|embodiment_channel|heat_level|polish_pass", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_voice_filter", "concept_id": "emotional_engine", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Retell the same raw moment twice—confession vs implication—keeping facts constant; identify lever moves (syntax, pacing, detail).", "expected_features": "Both versions read true; lever moves are visible.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Specific, embodied, and defensible", "Meets": "Mostly correct/specific", "Developing": "Vague, performative, or off-target"}, "variation_axes": "engine_type|ignition_source|vulnerability_mode|regulation|boundary|audience_distance|exposure_scope|embodiment_channel|heat_level|polish_pass", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "practice_id": "prac_body_bell", "practice_type": "drill", "duration_min": 7, "prompt": "Body bell: set a 7‑min timer; write only sensations before any reasons.", "success_criteria": "At least 5 concrete somatic cues on the page.", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}

{"concept_id": "emotional_engine", "practice_id": "prac_dialogue_self", "practice_type": "drill", "duration_min": 10, "prompt": "Two-column dialogue with the part that doesn’t want to speak.", "success_criteria": "Both sides speak; one specific admission lands.", "source_file": "Being an emotional writer.md", "source_md5": "b223b3202a0bbae32e81b30c3682669b", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:21:46.038417Z"}
